name: Olivier Chance
upgradeDialogue: Are you sure you're not wasting all of that on me?
Thank you... I guess...
I promise I won't disappoint you.

name: Cadence Morello
upgradeDialogue: Well, that's what I call a good investment!
Aw, ya make me feel real special!
Ain't this a little bit too much responsibility?
Ya know what? I trust ya. So... please trust me too.

name: Werner Waltz
upgradeDialogue: I will do my best to meet your standards.
I... appreciate your kindness. I promise I will not disappoint you.
I know you are... aware of my imperfections, but I will not allow them to deter me from standing by your side.

name: Maria Gloria-Fernandez
upgradeDialogue: Oh! Well, I always knew I could become even stronger, yes?
Hm... This feels good, no? I have decided. You are now a part of my crew... if you would like, yes?

name: Atienna Imamu
upgradeDialogue: Oh... this is interesting.
Ah...
It would be impossible for us to truly understand each other, don't you think? And yet... here we are, side-by-side...

name: Jericho
upgradeDialogue: I am leveling up.
... we are friends.

name: Shion Myosotis
upgradeDialogue: Oh... thank you! Please don't focus too much on me though. Have you leveled up Olive, Cadence, Werner, Maria, Atienna, or Jericho yet?
... Thank you for helping me even though I'm no longer...

name: Yuseong Claire
upgradeDialogue: Ah! You're too generous! ... Please continue...
Hm... this ranking is a little bit more befitting of a prince, isn't it?
This is probably as far as I can go but... is it me or does it feel kinda heavy? Well, it's alright. I don't mind it. I don't mind being like this if that means you can be a cloud.

name: Francis Foxman
upgradeDialogue: Oh... You're very generous. Thank you.
Oh? My ranking went up. Well... it wouldn't be polite of me to not give you anything in exchange, would it?
You've helped me this far. If you need anything, please don't hesitate to ask.
To be honest with you, I always feel like I'm struggling to match the pace of everyone else around me. But with you... It's nothing. Forget I said anything.

name: Gilbert Wolff
upgradeDialogue: Sh*t. I hope you know that there are no refunds.
Damn. My rank went up. That's never a good sign... but thanks.
Another promotion? Well...
You're putting a lot of faith in me. I hope you know that.

name: Trystan Carter
upgradeDialogue: I am grateful for you help, but I suggest you pass on any 'ranking up' to the prince.
... thank you. Again, I ask that you direct your donations to the prince.
You are being overgenerous. Please, allow me to do something for you in turn.
The world is injust, but people are not. People like yourself and the prince, at least. Thank you.

name: Talib Al-Jarrah
upgradeDialogue: I see. I see! You too are a supporter of the truth!
Well, well, well. We work quite well together don't we? I already have a partner, but I wouldn't mind it if you joined us on our search for the truth!
You know most Apeople avoid me--a worthwhile sacrifice against my relentless and daring fight against the Organization!--but it does get lonely on this journey... so thank you.
I had a friend once. He was my best friend... And he... Well, I promise you this. I won't leave you behind.

name: Nico Fabrizzio
upgradeDialogue: Oh! You didn't have to, but I appreciate it.
You know, professionally speakin', I'm the one who's supposed t'be lookin' after you... but... well...
I'm ranked higher than Werner now, aren't I...? I wonder if I can tease him about it. Thanks! Let me know if you need anythin'.

I'm not the most moral person nor am I the most reliable person, but medicine and people are what I know best, so if y'need anythin' about that, you can always ask me. I probably didn't start that off right, but... y'know what I mean.

name: Otto Vogt
upgradeDialogue: Oh...! Uhm, thank you, sir--I-I mean. Y-yes, thank you.
I-I promise I won't disappoint you, sir!
Thank you again, sir! Uhm... I'll continue to try my best!
Thank you for the promotion--I-I mean the rank up, sir.
I know I'm not the best at what I do... I know I'm average. But... thank you for giving me a chance like the hauptmann did. Sincerely, thank you.

name: Derik Stein
upgradeDialogue: Nice. I deserve that sh*t.
Keep it f*cking coming.
Yeah, that's what I'm f*cking talking about! Bet that brat'd be surprised that I'm ranked higher than him now.
I'm not going to gush like Vogt if that's what you were expecting. I'm not going to dedicate myself to you either--I already have that. But. If you need some b*stard dead, just ask me.

name: Alwin Brandt
upgradeDialogue: Oh! Showering me in gifts now, are you? How did you know that I'm easily bribed?
You're still at it? I admire that. Obviously, I can't give you my heart since I have a fiancee, but I could give you a story or two. Or maybe a lolipop? I *was* a nurse before this. What? No bite?

Why do you think people enjoy stories so much? Escapism if its fictional? Gossip if its real? Say, you read a book and you get attached to a character. Would you still be attacehd to that character if he was replaced by someone with the same name, the same face, almost the same history, but a different head on his shoulders? ...What? I'm only asking because I'm about to tell you something I heard the other day.

Does all of this count as a promotion? I could use some extra funds. My fiancee's been wanting to buy this one luxury purse for ages, and I haven't been able to get it to her with my current stipend. No, no, I'm not making a sob story out of it. *My* fiancee, *my* stipend, *my* country... Have you ever thought of how possessive the word 'my' is? How can you call it 'my' when it was technically never yours to begin with. Well, that's a story for another day. Thanks, *my* friend.

name: Leona Gloria-Angelo
upgradeDialogue: What is it? Did I ask for your help? Certainly not. IT's unwise to help another when you're incapable of helping yourself.

Hm... Your devotion and dedication... since you have given this much to me, allow me to leave you with a word of advice. Wherever you go, whatever you do, whatever you accomplish, never look back. That is true victory. Otherwise, it is simply regret.

name: Veles
upgradeDialogue: HAHAHAHAHA. Of course you would choose to support me. Of course you would. But, it is not you who is supporting me, but I-VELES-WHO IS SUPPORTING YOU!

I see, I see! So you have offered to me the fruits of your labor. Your efforts shall not go unrewarded. No efforts are. Your disposition reminds me of an adventurer that I once knew-no, perhaps no. Come closer. Let me see your face.

name: Theta (Foxman)
upgradeDialogue: Is it not the teacher that should be giving to the student? Ah, well, it's not unexpected--the changing tides of time, relationships, people... Ridiculous.

We have reached the point of no return. For me, there is nothing to return for. The person I was returning for is no longer here. However, that is just me. You... yes, you have potential and promise, child. I would like to see you flourish.

name: Omicron
upgradeDialogue: Oh? That's rather forward of you.
You've done that several times now... It wouldn't be just of me not to return the favor, would it? Don't get any ideas now. My right hand is already holding another's.

Since you've helped me, allow me to give you a word of advice. To some, the state of the world is an unsalvagable disappointment. You might think it's better to conceal it instead of facing it. However, it's working through the imperfections and the disappointment that you realize even dust has use. Hiding it away only leads to deprecation. If only I realized that sooner... If only I had more time... Well. That's just me. As my darling always says, I'm a ridiculous person. You on the other hand...

name: Omega
upgradeDialogue: Oh...? Oh...? Why make such a sacrifice when we're at the beginning of the end?
What do you call the vanity of a transient creature? Haha. I don't know either. I'm not one for self-awareness.
All of this life you're breathing into me. Should I thank you? Or should you thank me? You're such a cute fool--but not as cute a fool as me, of course.

We're here one moment and gone the next. Forgotten. Our existence insignificant in the turn of tge cycle. It'd be foolish for us to hold onto anything, and yet... here we are. You and me. Silly little things.

name: Tau
upgradeDialogue: What?! What is this?! What do you think you're doing?! Is this bribery?! You think you're above the law? Bribing me like this?! How dare you!
I will not be moved by such trickery!

You are a relentless criminal, aren't you? ... No one is above the law. I hope you realize that. The law of men, time, justice, life, the cycle. If you go agains it, you'll undoubtedly be punished. I'm not above punishment either. Yes, yes, I'm damned self-aware! Anyways. Whether that punishment is worth the sacrifice you think that you're making...

name: Iota (McKillop)
upgradeDialogue: Are you a Conductor? If you are, I'd rather take your head than a gift like this.

Damnit. It's just not fast enough. Nothing is. How long do you think you'll be here? How do you think I'll be here? Not long, so why the hell are we sitting around? Your gift is not enough. I don't even need it, if you use a conductor.

I'm... sorry for being a bit harsh. Call it impatience, a poor initiation, a poor personality--I can't control myself sometimes. Hm. Let met get a good look at you. Hm... you have a good sense of style.

I feel like ever second that passes by I'm slipping from one color to the next. Red, blue, red again, blue, white. Madness from a host that consumed the blood of children. Putrid. This is what conductors do. It's not good, don't you know? Not choosing a style stick to for awhile? Your style says everything about you. Well... at least your style is fashionable.

name: Jericho El-Mahdy (?)
upgradeDialogue: You should invest in your own growth as well.
Thank you. I appreciate your support. I have to say though that you should research all you can about a person or idea before you start investing in and supporting them.

I have many qualms about the way Ndoto is run. They say all are equal here but what about there? You can't make equal people who've come from different backgrounds by providing them with the same exact resources. If we try equity, I'm sure some would complain about some receiving more than others. Justice... removing all barriers and gates from the very beginning. Now... that truly is something. Even so, at least Ndoto gives justice in the way everyone returns to the tree. It's something I'm proud to take part in.
Hm... You've spent all this time listening to me and yet I haven't listened to you. What are you thoughts and opinions? On anything, on anyone, on anyplace. I'd love to hear them.
Let's take a picture together. If you're comfortable, of course.

name: Alma Mirragio
upgradeDialogue: Oh... your kindness is... Thank you for taking me one step closer to my dream. I won't forget you.
Oh, aren't you the sweetest thing?
Hm... Perhaps I should play you something as a thank you? I'm very familiar with entertaining people...
This place is absolutely suffocating... Don't you feel it? I think it'd do you well. If you and me were free.
Ah, that just gave me some inspiration!
We stand in separate cages as in entertainment for people more powerful than us. But you know what, dear? You're a divine bird.

name: Gamma (Wtorek)
upgradeDialogue: We are closing the distance to disrupting the syzygy. For Ophiuchus...
Cast aside your doubt and hesitation. We are doing what is necessary. Your life is but a blip, but your actions are not. Slowly, but surely, we are making progress.

name: Werner Waltz (?)
upgradeDialogue: Woahhh! I can level up too? That's so cool, man! Thanks!
I leveled up again! Can I level you up? Yeah, let me try! We can be like level-up buddies! ...Wait, how do I do that? '/upgrade....?' Technology is confusing... Where's Ollie? He can help!
Woah. I don't think I've been this high-leveled in anything... like, ever. You know... I'm only able to level up because of you!
I wonder if Kaiser can level up...? He'd be so... cool... so powerful. Kaiser: Rank, 10; Type: Cat King; Affiliation: Something-Cool... Yeah! We should level up Kaiser together!
Thanks again, man! You know... I feel kinda bad. I want to level you up too... Well, you know what? You're already Rank 10, so there's no rank higher than the cool that you are!
You know... people say that I'm not real bright and I'm not a good judge of character. Only one of those things must be right, because I know you're a great person! I'm your ride and die!

name: Scorpio (Nareen)
upgradeDialogue: Oh...? You're leveling me up? Why? Oh, I know. You have nothing else to do. You poor, precious, pitiable thing. Doing this for me won't do anything for you. You'll just see me repeat myself over and over again. Oh? Does that entertain you? Perhaps... I can help you find something more exciting that you can be passionate about. Regardless, I won't stop you, dear.

And what has bringing me to this point done for you? It certainly hasn't done anything for me. From your perspective, I'm not even real, so it hasn't done anything for you either. From my perspective, you aren't real either. It's quite sad, isn't it? All your work for something that isn't physical. Absolutely adorable. I can't get enough of you.

name: Kaiser (Cat)
upgradeDialogue: Mrep?
Purr.... purr....

name: (???) Yuseong
upgradeDialogue: Haven't we done this already? ..what's with that face? It looks like you've seen a ghost.
Yes, yes, kiddo, sacrifice all your other high-ranked cards to me. It makes me feel popular.
And there falls another one. Pun non-intended.

Ndoto is made up of a bunch of people wandering around and not looking for anything in particular. Dare I say it... It's filled with boring people. My homeroom teacher says that I'm a natural-born leader, so I *could* lead them all in the right direction, couldn't I? Become a policy maker and all that? But maybe I'm just getting carried away with my ego.
Mirrors are for self-discovery and self-awareness not whittling away your self-esteem. I should write that down. That's a good line.
Hm. Look at that. A cloud.
